description: This creamy Ukrainian beet salad is a perfect veggie side dish for all types of dishes.
keywords: Salad,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free
name: Beetroot & Cucumber Salad with Dill Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the chopped beetroot in a pan of boiling water and cook for 10-15 minutes, until tender. Drain well and place in a bowl of iced water to cool quickly.
Whisk the sour cream and mayonnaise together with the horseradish cream and onion powder. Drain the beetroot and tip into a large bowl with the cucumber, spring onions and cracked black pepper.
Add the dressing to the beetroot and toss well to coat. Stir in chopped dill and serve.
